title: Bug 118780: Expression builder shows old column names instead of aliases in dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for the columns.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking on a column name, the alias name should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
